newsArray.title: UEFA Super Cup: Bring On Real Madrid –Lookman Declares
creator: Austin Akhilomen
newsArray.description: Super Eagles forward, Ademola Lookman has declared his readiness to face Real Madrid ahead of Wednesday’s UEFA Super Cup in Warsaw. Recall that Atalanta won the Europa League while Real Madrid won the UEFA Champions League last season. Speaking with TribalFootball, the Nigerian international, who netted a hat-trick in the final against Bayer Leverkusen, stated [...]The post UEFA Super Cup: Bring On Real Madrid –Lookman Declares appeared first on Complete Sports.
